answers.answer: It's more like an educated guess
They can be 1lb off even with ultrasound.average is half a pound a week the last few weeks
Ultrasounds are just an estimate. lol Although I'm sure it could be possible, but ultrasounds can also be off. My friend was told her baby was going to be around 9.7lbs and he was only 7.3lbs
No …  no gestational diabetes !! & thanks ladiesss (:
Yes they can be waayyyy off!  My daughter was born at 40 weeks weighing 5lbs 0oz and they told me she was going to be 8lbs. Same with my son he was suppose to be 8lbs and ended up being 6 even.
It is possible at the end your baby can grow from a half a lb to a lb

I don't always believe that because I was told on a Friday that if I had my daughter any time soon that she wouldn't weigh no more than 4lbs, I had her less than 24hrs later and she was 7lbs 3oz. So those things are not always right.
With my first bby they told me my bby weight 8lbs 5oz And she wuz actually 7lbs 4oz
Its an estimate but in the last few weeks of your pregnancy baby should be gaining about a pound a week so its totally likely.
They told me I was going to have a small baby maybe '7 lbs' and he was born the next morning weighing 8.5lbs.It's just a guess

question: At 35 weeks they told me my baby weighted 5 lbs 10 oz now at 39 tgey told me 8 lbs 3 oz … can that even be possible ??
title: 3lbs !! is it possible ?
